title: Quick Tip to my fellow Toaster Players
body:
When you're in the client, click on the wheel on the top right corner, go to general options, enable low spec mode and disable animations.

Makes performance much much smoother.

replies.body: Yes!  This was a recent option adding for testing purposes on the new client, and[ released with current patch](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-624-notes#patch-league-client-update).  If you run into any problems be sure to report it to the client devs at the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Thanks!
